newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 10 muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 10 muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said Monday it qualified for bond insurance the following 10 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Edina, Minn., $5.09 million general obligation tax increment bonds.
--Sartell Independent School District No 748, Minn., $11.025 million GO refunding bonds.
--St. Louis Park, Minn., $7 million GO tax increment bonds.
--Las Cruces School District No. 2, N.M., $10 million school building GOs.
--Sherman Central School District, N.Y., $4.875 million school district GOs.
--Pearland Economic Development Authority, Texas, $5 million sales tax revenue bonds.
--West Bend, Wis., $3.25 million GO promissory notes.
